data.quote: Life is 10 percent what happens to me and 90 percent of how I react to it.
data.author: Charles Swindoll

data.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: The real opportunity for success lies within the person and not in the job.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: I have learned over the years that when one’s mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
data.author: Rosa Parks

data.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
data.author: Vincent van Gogh

data.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
data.author: Ronald Reagan

data.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
data.author: George Addair

data.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.
data.author: Arthur C. Clarke

data.quote: Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney
